Ask a cat about their opinion on being an indoor or outdoor cat and what they would prefer.
Ask a bird about their experience flying and if they have ever encountered any obstacles or challenges.
Ask a fish about their life in the ocean and if they have ever encountered any predators or other sea creatures.
Ask a horse about their favorite type of horse ride and if they have ever experienced any difficult or exciting rides.
Ask a cow about their thoughts on being a dairy cow and if they have any preferences on their living conditions.
